\documentclass[english]{article}
\usepackage[T1]{fontenc}
\usepackage[latin9]{inputenc}
\usepackage{amsmath}
\usepackage{babel}
\begin{document}
\[
\begin{array}{cclcccl}
t_{iT}' & = & \gamma\left(t_{iT}-\dfrac{V_{m/T}}{c^{2}}x_{iT}\right) & \qquad & t_{fT}' & = & \gamma\left(t_{fT}-\dfrac{V_{m/T}}{c^{2}}x_{fT}\right)\\
 & = & \left(\dfrac{5}{2}\right)\left(0-\left(\dfrac{\sqrt{21}}{5\,c}\right)0\right) &  &  & = & \left(\dfrac{5}{2}\right)\left(0-\left(\dfrac{\sqrt{21}}{5\,c}\right)\left(200\right)\right)\\
 & = & 0 &  &  & = & -\left(\dfrac{5}{2}\right)\left(\dfrac{4\sqrt{21}}{3\times10^{-8}}\right)\\
 &  &  &  &  & = & -7,64\times10^{-8}
\end{array}
\]

\[
\begin{array}{cclcccl}
x_{iT}' & = & \gamma\left(x_{iT}-\beta t_{iT}\right) & \qquad & x_{fT}' & = & \gamma\left(x_{fT}-\beta t_{fT}\right)\\
 & = & \left(\dfrac{5}{2}\right)\left(0-\left(\dfrac{\sqrt{21}}{5\,c}\right)0\right) &  &  & = & \left(\dfrac{5}{2}\right)\left(200-\left(\dfrac{\sqrt{21}}{5}\right)\left(0\right)\right)\\
 & = & 0 &  &  & = & 500
\end{array}
\]

\end{document}
